title: Gold Exports Mask Weakness in Canada’s Broader Trade Picture
description: Canada posted a C$583 million ($421 million) trade deficit in October, but surging precious‑metal exports — mostly gold — are doing a lot of heavy lifting. Strip those out, and Canada would have a C$8.2 billion shortfall.
content: Canada posted a C$583 million ($421 million) trade deficit in October, but surging precious‑metal exports — mostly gold — are doing a lot of heavy lifting. Strip those out, and Canada would have a C$8.2 billion shortfall.
